title: Targeting Ultimate Accuracy: Face Recognition via Deep Embedding
authors: J Liu, Y Deng, C Huang - arXiv preprint arXiv:1506.07310
excerpt: Abstract: Face Recognition has been studied for many decades. As opposed to traditional hand-crafted features such as LBP and HOG, much more sophisticated features can be learned automatically by deep learning methods in a data-driven way. In this paper, we  ...
